entry.cap:areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills

entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
